articles.title: Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to scientists, technicians, teachers and other working people, service personnel and officials who rendered great services for glorifying this year as the year of great revolutionary events to be specially recorded in the history of Songun Korea and for demonstrating the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation.
					 A ceremony of awarding the state commendations for Juche 104 (2015) took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Phyong Hae, and scientists, technicians, teachers and other people, service personnel and officials.
					
					 Order of Kim Il Sung was awarded to Cha Jong Bom and Kim Pok Nam, Order of Kim Jong Il to Choe Yong and the title of DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class to Ri Chon Su , Yang Mun Sang and 8 others. Kim Il Sung Prize went to Kim Yong Hui, Kim Jong Il Prize to Choe Song Chon, watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung to Jo Sok Chol, O Chol Si and twelve others, citations of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to Kim Mun Chol, Kim Chon Ung and 21 others, citations of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un to Kim Kwang Hyok and Sin Jong Nam, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to So Tong Il and three others and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Ju Song Gun and five others.
					
					 Honorary titles were also conferred upon persons of merit and Order of National Flag First Class upon O Su Nam, Ri Sang Sop, Ri In Chol and 51 others.
					
					 Order of Labor went to four persons and Order of National Flag Second Class to 25 persons.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) held a meeting at the Central Youth Hall on Friday on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., DWUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 She and other speakers noted that the proud history and tradition of the Songun revolution, which has emerged ever-victorious and glorious, are being successfully inherited as the Korean people are holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Un consolidated and developed the KPA into a matchless and powerful elite revolutionary army full of the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and equipped with powerful Korean-style means of strike, they said, adding:
					
					 He bestowed such a high honor as assistants to husbands in firing machine-guns upon the wives of servicemen, who devote their all to bolstering up military capabilities while valuing the national affairs more than their own household, and led with warm care the Korean women so that they could share breath with the supreme command on the road of the Songun revolution.
					
					 They called on all officials and members of the union to staunchly fight for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, revolutionary cause of Songun, rallied firmly behind the Marshal.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Osandok Prize Sports Contest closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Friday.
					 During the contest the players and coaches displayed high skill and staunch spirit by actively applying Korean-style playing tactics to the events such as football, ice hockey and speed skating.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Ro Tu Chol, chairman of the State Planning Commission and vice-chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, sportspersons and working people.
					
					 The Taesongsan Sport Team came top in the team standings.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Nampho Port Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Nampho Port Marked 
 Nampho, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Nampho Port commemorated its 70th founding anniversary. 
					 The port takes an important share in foreign trade and maritime transport development of the country. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made sure that Nampho Port was founded on December 26, Juche 34 (1945) and visited it more than 20 times to show bright ways for it to follow. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the port together with Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, on April 13, Juche 36 (1947). After that he visited the port ten-odd times to indicate tasks and ways for building the port. 
					
					 The port has developed into a reliable foreign trade base under the leadership and care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and it has successfully fulfilled its revolutionary duties for the past seven decades.
					
					 There took place a meeting marking the anniversary on Friday.

articles.title: Successes Made in Forest Restoration
articles.content:
Successes Made in Forest Restoration
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK had achieved big successes in the autumn campaign for forest restoration.
					 According to data available, more than 1,100 tons of tree seeds were gathered, millions of holes dug and tens of hectares of firewood forests created throughout the country.
					
					 Pyongyang City gathered over 20 tons of tree seeds, digging pits at 107 percent.
					
					 North Phyongan Province turned out 90 million saplings and planted 340 hectares with 1.38 million trees of good species.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province collected at least 220 tons of tree seeds, produced 63 million saplings and planted over 7.69 million trees.
					
					 Ongjin and Pyoksong counties in South Hwanghae Province created some 10 hectares of firewood forest.
					
					 The same can be said of North Hwanghae, South Phyongan, North Hamgyong and Jagang provinces.

articles.title: Taesongsan Sports Team of DPRK
articles.content:
Taesongsan Sports Team of DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Taesongsan Sports Team of the DPRK showed good results in short-track speed skating of the Osandok Prize Sports Contest held here recently.
					 Hyon Myong and Ri Ji Ryon of the team came first in men's 500m, 1 000m and women's 1 000m events.
					
					 The team putting the main stress on winter sports events has proven successful in international and national tournaments in recent years.
					
					 Its players won a lot of medals, including golds, in the ISU World Development Trophy Short-track Speed Skating Tournament and the Asian Cup Figure Skating Tournament.
					
					 This year the team bagged many gold medals in ice hokey, figure skating, short-track speed skating events of the DPRK Championships.

articles.title: Gangster-like Logic of U.S. Denounced
articles.content:
Gangster-like Logic of U.S. Denounced
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff in a recent workshop in Washington said an armed conflict on the Korean Peninsula would lead to a super-local war and its reason is because the DPRK develops ballistic missiles and bolsters up the cyber war capabilities as part of various preparations. Even he compared the DPRK with the "Islamic State" while calling the anti-terrorist war an example of the super-local war. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. intention is to justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK by branding the DPRK's capabilities for self-defense as "threat" and labeling it as a "disturber of peace". 
					
					 It is the strategic goal of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK with unchallenged military supremacy and advance to the continent. 
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. are technically at war. 
					
					 Under this situation, if the U.S. makes provocation, it will not be confined to a local war but lead to an all-out war and surrounding countries will be embroiled in it. 
					
					 The U.S. took issue with ballistic missiles of the DPRK to justify its assertion. But it is the illogical sophism. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has the biggest number of ballistic missiles in the world. The U.S. deployed those missiles in south Korea and other different parts of the world, threatening other countries and openly revealing the attempt at a preemptive attack on them. 
					
					 The comparison of the DPRK with the "Islamic State" while talking about the situation of the Middle East is an intolerable insult to the DPRK. The DPRK will surely make the U.S. pay for this. 
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its war deterrent for peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world as long as the U.S. continuously pursues hostile policy toward it.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Ambition for "Unification by Absorption"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Ambition for "Unification by Absorption"
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Minister of Unification of south Korea Hong Yong Phyo groundlessly took issue with paragraph 2 of the June 15 joint declaration, asserting that the "proposal for unification represented by the word of federal formula is the north's" and "unification by federal formula can never be accepted".
					 Next day, a spokesman for the Ministry of Unification held a briefing to support Hong's assertion.
					
					 Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The DPRK can never remain an onlooker to the assertion made by the Ministry of Unification against unification by federal formula. 
					
					 Such assertion represents the stand of the south Korean authorities, rather than stands of individuals such as the minister and spokesman. 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration was the only one agreed upon between the north and south over the method of reunification in the history of national division. Therefore, the declaration enjoyed support and welcome of all Koreans and the international community.
					
					 The south Korean conservative ruling forces' above-said assertion is enough to guess what is the "unification" touted by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 In another words, it goes to clearly prove once again what they seek is nothing but "unification by absorption" and "unification of social systems".
					
					 The stand on the reunification by federal formula is a touchstone distinguishing reunification from division, and peace from war.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have a sincere will to respect all the agreements between the north and the south including the June 15 joint declaration, they should drop the ambition for "unification by absorption", the product of confrontation with compatriots, and make a decision to opt for realizing the reunification by federal formula.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Act Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Act Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Security Investigation Group of the South Chungchong Provincial Police Agency walked away Choe Min, member of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, on December 20, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo. 
					 Now Choe Min is staging a hunger strike, rejecting police interrogation. 
					
					 Members of the Korea Solidarity held a rally outside the building of the Security Investigation Group on December 21 in denunciation of the authorities' fascist act. 
					
					 Speakers there said the police should not arrest a conscientious patriotic youth but detain Park Geun Hye who is deteriorating people's living while keeping mum about the U.S. forces' introduction of anthrax germ.
					
					 They demanded immediate disbandment of the Security Investigation Group and declared they would struggle for the release of the patriotic youth and the resignation of the present regime. 
					
					 At the end of the rally they launched a demonstration.

articles.title: KCTU Stages All-night Sit-in
articles.content:
KCTU Stages All-night Sit-in 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) staged the large-scale all-night sit-in for checking the retrogressive revision of labor law and frustrating the police's suppression in Seoul on December 22, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Before starting the strike KCTU held a candlelight rally.
					
					 At the rally speakers denounced the "Saenuri Party" and the "government" for trying to make workers slaves of capital. 
					
					 They called upon workers to pool their efforts to make 2016 a year of achieving rights of workers. 
					
					 At the end of the rally core members of KCTU from all parts of south Korea went into the all-night sit-in around the "National Assembly" building. 
					
					 KCTU declared it would continue the sit-in strike till the "National Assembly" stops the discussion on the bill on labor.

articles.title: U.S. Germ Tests Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Germ Tests Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBC Monday condemned the U.S. imperialist aggression forces for their anthrax germ tests in south Korea.
					 Expressing a great shock at the anthrax germ tests that was carried out in downtown Seoul, the broadcasting service accused the U.S. of claiming it is the first time that it introduced the anthrax germ into its air force base in Osan.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have so far shielded such a poor excuse of the U.S. forces side, it charged.

articles.title: Action to Advance into U.S. Embassy Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action to Advance into U.S. Embassy Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea staged an action of advancing into the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Dec. 23.
					 They said that the action is an anti-war and anti-U.S. demo expressing the people's anger at the concealment of anthrax germ tests that the U.S. forces present in south Korea conducted 15 times in Ryongsan, Seoul.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists plan to launch a bio-chemical war by use of anthrax germ and reduce the Korean Peninsula into a war theater again, they said, adding:
					
					 The security authorities hurled policemen into taking away demonstrators.
					
					 This made the Solidarity declare an all-night sit-in.

articles.title: Re-investigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Re-investigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea made public a commentary on Dec. 23.
					 The letter "No. 1" written on the propelling body of torpedo which the south Korean authorities put as clear evidence of "torpedo attack by the north" has been corroded, making discernment all the more hard, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 There is also suspicion about how the letter "No. 1" remains vivid when all the wrecks of the propelling body of the torpedo have been rotten as they have been under the sea for a long time.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and many other civic and social organizations and experts at home and abroad have raised various suspicions and refutation as regards the results made by the joint investigation team.
					
					 The above-said case has been a factor that impaired the inter-Korean relations and fostered antagonism between the two sides for the past five years.
					
					 The case should be re-investigated.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Dec. 19.
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and a basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as a leadership political body.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Benin, Cambodia and Angola from Dec. 14 to 16 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants paid homage to Kim Jong Il at the remembrance meeting held by the Socialist Party of Benin.
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, made sure that the DPRK displayed its dignity as an independent power by increasing the military capabilities of the country in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 A vice-chairperson of the External Relations Commission of the People's Party of Cambodia said Kim Jong Il was the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and a close friend of the Cambodian people.
					
					 The People's Party of Cambodia attaches importance to the friendship with the WPK and hopes to see the steady development of the relations between the two countries and parties, added the vice-chairperson.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia under the sponsorship of the committee for remembering General Kim Jong Il and round-table talks by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of A Just Russia on Dec. 16 and 17 on the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairperson of the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia made the following speech:
					
					 We are deeply touched by the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il during which he made tireless efforts to develop the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea of the era of independence.
					
					 The Korean people could work miracles in the cause of bringing prosperity to the country in close unity around the party and the leader as they upheld him as the successor to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He is still remembered by the Russian people as well as the Korean people.
					
					 The chairperson of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of A Just Russia praised Kim Jong Il as the people's leader as he dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Ghanaian Political Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Ghanaian Political Personage
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The undying exploits of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il will be kept in the minds of the world progressives.
					 A deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said this in his statement issued on Dec. 14 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said Kim Jong Il was not only the greatest man who devoted his whole life to the happiness of the people but a peerless statesman who built the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into a vanguard unit of the popular masses and a fine example for the world progressive parties to follow.
					
					 He, on behalf of the leadership of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana, heartily wished the WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un great success in the sacred struggle of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Syrian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Syrian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Syrian media observed the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il from Dec. 9 to 17.
					 Al Baath carried an article illustrated with the photo of a panoramic view of Pyongyang. It introduced the Korean people who spent the past four years after demise of Kim Jong Il with ardent yearnings, invariable loyalty and noble sense of morality.
					
					 Al Thawrah noted he put primary effort to bolstering up the military capabilities to build the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress, further consolidated the great unity between the servicepersons and people to rally them around the party and brought about a turning phase in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Tishrin said he maintained the principle of giving priority to the future of the country in shaping any line and policy.
					
					 Nidal Al-Palyahin noted with appreciation he turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence by applying the Juche idea.
					
					 Syria TV Channel showed the footage of his revolutionary activities, speaking highly of his ideo-theoretical feats and Songun leadership feats, while the Syrian Radio praised the revolutionary career and exploits of the peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Efectuada ceremonia de condecoracion  estatal del 104 (2015) de Era Juche
articles.content:
Efectuada ceremonia de condecoracion  estatal del 104 (2015) de Era Juche
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hubo la condecoracion estatal a los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores y trabajadores, asi como los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y funcionarios, quienes hicieron gran aporte a glorificar el presente ano como el de gran jubilo revolucionario a ser registrado en la historia de la Corea del Songun y a manifestar la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de condecoracion estatal del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
					
					Participaron alli Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, trabajadores, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y funcionarios.
					
					La Orden Kim Il Sung fue concedido a Cha Jong Bom; la Orden Kim Jong Il, a Choe Yong; el titulo del Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC con la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, a Ri Chon Su, Yang Mun Sang y otros 8; el Premio Kim Il Sung, a Kim Yong Hui; el Premio Kim Jong Il, a Choe Song Chon; el reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung, a Jo Sok Chol, O Chol Si y otros 12; el diploma de honor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, a Kim Mun Chol, Kim Chon Ung y otros 21; el diploma de honor del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un, a Kim Kwang Hyok y Sin Jong Nam; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung, a So Tong Il y otros 3 y el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il, a Ju Song Gun y otros 5.
					
					O Su Nam, Ri Sang Sop, Ri In Chol y otros 51 recibieron la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase.
					
					Fueron otorgadas la Orden de Trabajo a 4 personas y la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase, a 25.
